item.title: Početak: Roštilj, roštilj a kakav je BBQ?
item.description: Roštilj odnosno grill Roštilj za mene simbolizira ručak nedjeljom i obiteljsko okupljanje. Naravno i dobar dio nekakvih proslava je počeo ili završio roštiljanjem. Carsko, vratina, piletina, šnicle i ponešto povrća iznad žara uveseljavalo uvijek izaziva osmijeh na licu i pojačano izlučivanje sline. Sam čin loženja vatre i iščekivanja savršenog žara budi nešto praiskonsko u nama pa se u mom slučaju ne mali broj puta duže ložilo nego peklo :) Dim i okus pečenog mesa i povrća meni je bio ne zamjenjiv.

item.title: Chapter IV: Master Jacques Coppenole
item.description: While the pensioner of Ghent and his eminence were exchanging very low bows and a few words in voices still lower, a man of lofty stature, with a large face and broad shoulders, presented himself, in order to enter abreast with Guillaume Rym; one would have pronounced him a bull-dog by the side of a fox. His felt doublet and leather jerkin made a spot on the velvet and silk which surrounded him.
